#### 42
She wants to read 400+300=<<400+300=700>>700 pages total.
She needs to spend 700/100 = <<700/100=7>>7 hours reading in the next three weeks.
In minutes, she will need to spend 7*60 = <<7*60=420>>420 minutes.
Thus, she should spend 420 minutes/10 days = <<420/10=42>>42 minutes per day reading.
